import {React, useState} from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: '', pass: '', cpass: '' }) let keyname, valuename; const handleInputs = (e)=> { console.log(user) keyname = e.target.name valuename = e.target.value setUser({... user, [keyname]: valuename}) } return (
